name: aster-management-performance-tests
description: Performance testing suite for Aster Management using k6

scripts.test:all: npm run test:baseline && npm run test:load && npm run test:stress
scripts.install:k6:linux: curl -s https://dl.k6.io/key.gpg | sudo apt-key add - && echo 'deb https://dl.k6.io/deb stable main' | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/k6.list && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install k6

author: Aster Management Team
